headline: Broadcom price target raised to $250 from $201 at Evercore ISI
summary: Evercore ISI raised the firm’s price target on Broadcom (AVGO) to $250 from $201 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares following its October-end quarter EPS beat and January quarter implied EPS outlook of $1.53. The firm continues to view Broadcom as a “top Custom AI beneficiary” and believes investors are underestimating the custom AI chip opportunity, the analyst noted. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. Try Now>> See In

headline: Broadcom price target raised to $210 from $195 at Baird
summary: Baird raised the firm’s price target on Broadcom (AVGO) to $210 from $195 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm noted they nnounced two additional custom ASIC customers with potential revenue contribution prior to F2027, and provided an AI SAM implying about 60% three-year CAGR, reinforcing the view that AI will be the key growth engine for the company medium term. headline: Broadcom price target raised to $250 from $200 at Piper Sandler
summary: Piper Sandler raised the firm’s price target on Broadcom (AVGO) to $250 from $200 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares. The company reported a strong Q4 nd January guidance and most importantly, talked about the inflection in its artificial intelligence business and clearly laid out multi-year growth visibility through 2027, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
